value.desc: Model of the component defining current panel name, or if `multiple` props is used, **must** be an array; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

multiple.desc: When true, turns on the ability to have more the one panel visible at a time. In this case, the `v-model` can only be an array of names that contains the opened panels

active-color.desc: The [Quasar Color Palette](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) color to be attributed to the titlebar text of the active panel

active-bg-color.desc: The [Quasar Color Palette](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) color to be attributed to the titlebar background of the active panel

inactive-color.desc: The [Quasar Color Palette](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) color to be attributed to the titlebar text of the inactive panel

inactive-bg-color.desc: The [Quasar Color Palette](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) color to be attributed to the titlebar background of the inactive panel

isOpened.desc: Check if the specified tab is open

name.desc: The name of the tab pane

returns.desc: Returns true if the tab panel is opened, otherwise false

openTab.desc: Opens the specified tab panel only if does not have the property `disable` set to true on the tab panel

name.desc: The name of the tab panel to open

returns.desc: Returns true if the tab panel was opened, otherwise false

name.desc: The name of the tab panel to close
